Tableau Exercise - Using superstore 2020 data from lesson 2

Creating a sales vs profit graph

1.  Drag Profit to rows and Sales to Columns
2.  Drag State to detail under Marks
3.  Drag Sales to Size to adjust the size of the bubble
4.  Drag Profit to Color to adjust the colour of the bubbles
5.  Drag Order Date to filters to filter based on the year of the profit - Click on the dropdown

Creating

1.  Drag sales to Rows and Order date to column
2.  To create a dual axis graph, drag Profit to the graph until you see the dotted horizontal line and drop it
